TEXT: The applicant is a NORP national , born in DATE and living in GPE .
A.

The applicant worked as an engineer for the joint - stock company “ Saturn ” ( АООТ « САТУРН MONEY ) ( “ the company ” ) . Because of the financial difficulties of the company the applicant was ordered to take unpaid leave for the period from DATE to CARDINAL DATE . It appears that the applicant decided to take further unpaid leave until DATE .
In DATE , while on leave , the applicant brought an action for damages against the company requesting compensation for losses she had incurred and reinstatement in her former job .
On DATE ORG Прикубанский районный суд ) refused to deal with the applicant ’s action on the grounds that she had failed to comply with the procedural requirements .

On DATE the same court , after a public hearing , dismissed the applicant ’s rectified action finding , inter alia , that the company ’s financial difficulties had an objective basis which was beyond the court ’s control .
On DATE ORG ( ORG краевой суд ) , upon the applicant 's appeal , upheld the judgment of ORG .
On DATE , the applicant was dismissed from work following a reorganisation of the company .

The applicant lodged several complaints with various ORG administrative authorities . On DATE and CARDINAL DATE she was informed by ORG инспекция труда по PERSON ) and ORG ( Федеральная инспекция труда ) respectively that labour disputes fell within the competence of the national courts .

By letter of DATE the Deputy Krasnodarsk Regional Prosecutor ( заместитель прокурора NORP края ) rejected the applicant ’s application to file an appeal for a supervisory review ( hereafter referred to as an “ application for a supervisory review ” ) ( жалоба в порядке надзора ) against the ordinary courts’ judgments , finding that the issues raised by the applicant had been properly dealt with by the national courts .

The applicant lodged another application for supervisory review with ORG requesting that the ordinary courts’ judgments be quashed and her case reconsidered . By letter of CARDINAL DATE the Deputy President of ORG informed the applicant that her application had been rejected for being unsubstantiated , as confirmed by letter of DATE from the President of ORG .
By letter of DATE ORG ( NORP края ) rejected the applicant ’s third application for a supervisory review .
By letters of DATE and DATE ORG ( Генеральная прокуратура ) dismissed the applicant ’s fourth application for a supervisory review against the ordinary courts’ judgments .

By letter of DATE the President of ORG of ORG ( Председатель состава Судебной коллегии по гражанским делам ORG ) rejected the applicant ’s fifth application for a supervisory review as unsubstantiated .
By letter of DATE the Deputy Prosecutor General PERSON ) rejected the applicant ’s sixth and last application for a supervisory review .
By letter of DATE ORG ) informed the applicant that it was not competent to deal with her complaint .
B. Relevant domestic law

According to LAW ( “ the LAW ) , judgments , court rulings and decrees which have entered into force , may be reviewed by way of supervision following a “ protest ” ( протест ) lodged by the persons listed in LAW .
According to LAW , the persons competent to lodge a protest are ORG and the President of ORG .

According to LAW , the persons listed in LAW are entitled , subject to certain conditions , to obtain the case file in a civil case in order to establish whether there are any grounds for lodging a protest by way of supervision .
